mapper.update: update badge_customer set beans = #{beans} where emblem_id = #{emblemId} and customer_id = #{customerId};
mapper.select: SELECT c.customer_id, c.emblem_id, a.`id`, l.`level`, a.`name`, c.`beans` FROM badge_customer c LEFT JOIN badge_level l ON c.emblem_id = l.id LEFT JOIN badge a ON l.badge_id = a.id WHERE c.customer_id = #{id}
